column1: Wow, that's a lot of meteor fragments.
I'll pick some up to take home for sis.
She certainly has never seen them.
Welcome to this altar under the starry night,
Miss Youkai.
Huh? You can see me?
You have collected so many meteor fragments
that your body is shining brightly.
It's very noticeable.
So that's why; so cool!
As long as I have these meteorites with me, everyone will see me.
I'm so happy; thank you for telling me.
Sorry to dissapoint you, but
in a few days these meteorites will lose their light.
Is that so…
But how do you know about that?
Because the one who summoned those meteorites
is no one else but me, Rakukun Momosame.
So why did you summon them?
Do you want to hold a meteor shower party?
In that case, I'll participate.
Unfortunately not.
I summoned these meteorites to achieve my dream.
Your dream!?
Is that really possible!?
This is real
as long as the “Star God” answers my prayers.
Wow! That's great; I want to make a wish, too!
There's something I want to achieve particularly!
Unfortunately, if you have a tainted heart, the God won't answer your prayers.
That's not a problem.
I'll take you down and make a wish before you do!
What!?
You're going to rob me like a bandit!?
Even though I'm no longer a Satori,
robbing a human is still beneath the dignity of a youkai.
But
if it can really work,
if I can really get a wish,
I really want to be with my big sis…
Say no more!
I won't let you take my dream away from me!
